title: env.get Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Response containing environment variable values and metadata based on the request parameters.

body.description: If a `name` was not specified, an object with `name` and `value` pairs for all environment variables.

text.description: If a `name` was specified, the value of the environment variable.

time.description: The time of the Notecard variable or variables change.

samples.title: Single Variable Response
samples.description: Response for a single environment variable request.

samples.title: Multiple Variables Response
samples.description: Response for multiple environment variables request.

samples.title: All Variables Response
samples.description: Response for all environment variables request.
